subtasks.name: Review Regulation Text
subtasks.description: Read and understand the requirements outlined in the Responsible AI Safety and Education Act (RAISE Act)
subtasks.notes: Initial step to familiarize with the regulation

subtasks.name: Identify Applicable Sections
subtasks.description: Identify specific sections of the regulation that apply to the company's AI models and operations
subtasks.notes: Critical for determining the scope of compliance efforts

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Create a detailed plan outlining steps to ensure compliance with the RAISE Act
subtasks.notes: Legal expertise essential for interpreting and implementing the requirements

subtasks.name: Update Policies and Procedures
subtasks.description: Revise existing policies and procedures to align with the new regulations
subtasks.notes: Legal review necessary to ensure accuracy and completeness

subtasks.name: Employee Training
subtasks.description: Provide training to employees on the requirements of the RAISE Act and how it impacts their roles
subtasks.notes: HR expertise needed to develop and deliver effective training programs

key_risks: Non-compliance leading to legal penalties
Data breaches due to inadequate AI safety measures

subtasks.name: Understand Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Read and comprehend the Responsible AI Safety and Education Act (RAISE Act) to understand the compliance obligations.
subtasks.notes: Critical task to ensure compliance with the new regulation.

subtasks.name: Assess Current AI Practices
subtasks.description: Evaluate the current AI models and practices within the business to identify gaps in compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: May require technical expertise to assess AI systems effectively.

subtasks.name: Implement Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Establish protocols for transparency in AI model training and use as required by the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Critical for maintaining compliance and trust in AI practices.

key_risks: Non-compliance with transparency requirements
Failure to protect trade secrets and confidential information

subtasks.name: Review and Understand Regulation
subtasks.description: Read and comprehend the Responsible AI Safety and Education Act (RAISE Act) to identify key requirements and implications for healthcare operations.
subtasks.notes: Critical to establish a foundation for compliance efforts.

subtasks.name: Assess Current AI Systems
subtasks.description: Evaluate existing artificial intelligence systems in use within the healthcare organization to determine compliance gaps with the new regulation.
subtasks.notes: May require technical expertise to accurately assess systems.

subtasks.name: Develop AI Training and Use Policies
subtasks.description: Create policies and procedures that align with the transparency and protection requirements outlined in the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Legal expertise crucial to ensure policies comply with the law.

subtasks.name: Employee Training on AI Ethics
subtasks.description: Provide training sessions for employees on the ethical use of artificial intelligence systems.
subtasks.notes: Human resources expertise needed for effective training implementation.

subtasks.name: Implement AI Model Auditing Process
subtasks.description: Establish a process for auditing AI models to ensure compliance with transparency requirements.
subtasks.notes: Technical expertise necessary for effective auditing procedures.

key_risks: Non-compliance with AI transparency requirements
Lack of expertise in assessing AI systems

subtasks.name: Regulatory analysis
subtasks.description: Review and analyze the new regulation to understand its implications on the organization's AI models and operations
subtasks.notes: Legal expertise required to interpret and apply the regulation correctly

subtasks.name: Policy and procedure update
subtasks.description: Update existing policies and procedures to ensure compliance with the new regulation
subtasks.notes: Ensure alignment with regulatory requirements and internal processes

subtasks.name: Employee training
subtasks.description: Develop and conduct training sessions for employees on the new AI safety and education requirements
subtasks.notes: HR expertise needed to design effective training programs

subtasks.name: Compliance monitoring
subtasks.description: Establish monitoring mechanisms to ensure ongoing compliance with the regulation
subtasks.notes: Critical for detecting and addressing any compliance issues

subtasks.name: Risk assessment
subtasks.description: Conduct a risk assessment to identify potential areas of non-compliance and develop mitigation strategies
subtasks.notes: Legal expertise crucial for accurate risk assessment and mitigation

key_risks: Failure to comply with the new regulation could result in legal penalties
Inadequate employee training may lead to non-compliance issues
